open-date.description: Date and time when the listing was opened

item-is-marketplace.description: Flag indicating if the item is listed on the marketplace

item-note.description: Any additional notes related to the item

item-condition.description: Condition of the item (e.g., New, Used)

zshop-category1.description: Category of the product on Zshop

asin1.description: Amazon Standard Identification Number (ASIN) 1 of the product

asin2.description: Amazon Standard Identification Number (ASIN) 2 of the product

asin3.description: Amazon Standard Identification Number (ASIN) 3 of the product

will-ship-internationally.description: Flag indicating if the product will ship internationally

expedited-shipping.description: Flag indicating if expedited shipping is available for the product

zshop-boldface.description: Flag indicating if the listing is in boldface on Zshop

bid-for-featured-placement.description: Flag indicating if the product is eligible for featured placement bids

add-delete.description: Flag indicating if the listing is to be added or deleted

pending-quantity.description: Quantity of items pending for listing

fulfillment-channel.description: Channel through which fulfillment is done (e.g., FBA, MFN)

merchant-shipping-group.description: Grouping of items for merchant shipping purposes

dataEndTime.description: End time of the data in date format
